text: Dienison Gomes do Carmo (born October 12, 1991 in Macapá), known by his nickname Cavalo, is a Brazilian footballer who plays for Botafogo–DF as right back. He already played for national competitions such as Copa do Brasil and Campeonato Brasileiro Série D for Santos–AP. He have already played in several amapá teams, such as Independente–AP, Trem, Santana and Santos–AP, being winner of Campeonato Amapaense 2011, 2015 and 2016 editionsCopa do Brasil 2016: conheça Cavalo, um dos personagens do Santos AP ==Career statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|State League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Conmebol !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan=4 valign="center"|Santos–AP |2014 |rowspan=3|Série D |9||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||9||0 |- |2015 |0||0||colspan="2"|—||0||0||colspan="2"|—||0||0||0||0 |- |2016 |colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||2||0||colspan="2"|—||0||0||2||0 |- !colspan="2"|Subtotal !9!!0!!colspan="2"|—!!2!!0!!colspan="2"|—!!0!!0!!11!!0 |- |valign="center"|Botafogo–DF |2016 |Brasiliense B |colspan="2"|—||3||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||3||0 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !9!!0!!3!!0!!2!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!14!!0 |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:People from Macapá Category:Association football fullbacks Category:Santos Futebol Clube (AP) players
